txt.en:
Enhances several Balefire skills while active.

Wisp of Flame: Restores morale and more power on successive fire hits while Wisp of Flame is active on a target.
Lingering Fire-strike: Applies max rank of debuff and damage-over-time.
Fire-blast: Adds a damage-over-time after the main damage is dealt.
Torrent of Flame: Adds a morale-over-time effect to the sorceress when the channel is active.

Cannot be cast out of combat.
